news.title: Apples KI-Chef räumt den Posten nach Siri-Problemen

news.title: Inside Mirakl's agentic commerce vision
news.description: Mirakl is redefining commerce through AI agents and ChatGPT Enterprise—achieving faster documentation, smarter customer support, and building toward agent-native commerce with Mirakl Nexus.

news.description: OpenAI and NORAD are bringing new magic to “NORAD Tracks Santa” with three ChatGPT holiday tools that let families create festive elves, toy coloring pages, and custom Christmas stories.
